TopicTitle: O'Hai! Old KSPer / New Forum user

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone.

Although I'm gaming KSP for quite a while (since 0.14), Only now I got a forum account.

Why only now? I dunno... I was busy blowing up stuff on ascension, I guess.

Kudos!

Welcome to the forums! Feel free to ask around if you still need help with anything, or to give advice yourself to some of the newer users that might need help getting on your level.

While I'm here, I might as well ask: Do you have any particularly harrowing or exciting missions you've done in the past that still stand out in your mind?
0.14, eh? Welcome to the very small percentage of people that had the game before planets were implemented! It's crazy how many people have bought the game in the past two years alone.
